competition_summary.context: competition, business torts, and declaratory judgment of no trade secret misappropriation (the “Massachusetts Action”). On April 5, 2018, Viasat counterclaimed with contract, trade secret, and unfair competition claims. Following resolution of Viasat 1, Acacia and Viasat jointly agreed to dismiss the Massachusetts Action in October 2022, thereby resolving the case. We are unable to reasonably estimate the ultimate outcome of any of the Viasat Cases at this time due to uncertainties in the litiga
